meta.name: Florian Dupuis
meta.title: Florian Dupuis | FullStack Developer
meta.description: Freelance Full Stack Web Developer, Designer & Entrepreneur

about.description:
My name is Florian Dupuis, I'm a 26 years old web developer. I have been coding for more than 10 years and I love about new technologies around digital and more particularly the web as a whole. I developed a certain attraction for Front-End and Back-End web development, especially Javascript which I made my specialty. I am also comfortable with PHP language and I have a strong CMS Wordpress and Prestashop experience. 

 I currently consider myself as a Digital Nomad, my situation allows me to combine travel and work at the same time. I travel through the world at the same time as I type lines of code. At that time, I live in Montreal, Canada. 

 I use to work as a freelance but I also develop digital projects independently. For more than a year, I have been working within Groupe ADP | Aéroports de Paris, which I support in the evolution of their digitization by developing innovative functionalities for them, and projects based on cutting-edge technologies.

items.name: Extime.com
items.description: Development of a Marketplace application for Aéroports de Paris under the Next.JS framework (React.JS).

items.name: Paris airports | ADP Group
items.description: Technological and graphic modernization of the Aéroports de Paris home page using the Next.JS (React.JS) framework.

items.name: Vuse.com Canada
items.description: Maintenance, optimization, integration of new Front-End & Back-End elements under the Koa.JS (Node.js) + and Gatsby.JS (React.JS) frameworks.

items.name: Le Philtre Interactive Map
items.description: Technical optimization of the site, addition of age control features and interactive map of distribution points. Based on React.JS and Wordpress API

items.name: Obypay Interactive Menu
items.description: Development of an interactive mobile and tablet menu for Obypay customers under the Nuxt.JS (Vue.JS) framework.

items.name: Ads website Esprit-Auto
items.description: Implementation of an cars seller ads site powered by an API. Front-End under the React.JS framework and content delivered by Wordpress API.

items.name: Effidays event showcase
items.description: Showcase site with interactive event calendar. Integrated under the Nuxt.JS (Nuxt.JS) framework for optimal loading time

items.name: Effilocal redesign
items.description: Graphic redesign on a new basis of the WordPress CMS and the Elementor Pro theme builder.

items.name: Redesigned E-Shop Taillevent
items.description: Graphic redesign of a Prestashop 1.6 site to Prestashop 1.7. Lossless data migration and performance optimization.

items.name: Onyx Group Showcase Site
items.description: Creation of a showcase websitesite aimed to promote the company. Made in Wordpress using the Divi theme builder.

items.name: E-Commerce Emeu KidStore
items.description: Realization of a customizable E-Commerce website under the Prestashop 1.7 CMS. Affiliate and partnership module integration.

items.name: E-Shop Travel Workshop
items.description: Graphic redesign and migration of a Prestashop 1.6 site to Prestashop 1.7. Implementation of a suitcase customization module.

items.name: E-Commerce Hannahpad
items.description: Maintenance, optimization of site performance. Added new features. Maintenance of a dedicated OVH server.

items.name: E-Commerce Popart Piercing
items.description: Realization of a safe-to-measure E-Commerce site under the Prestashop 1.7 CMS. Responsive Mobile/Tablet/Desktop. Maintains site performance.

items.name: Site Paléordovie
items.description: Creation of a showcase site aimed at highlighting the archeology site. Made in Wordpress using the Divi theme builder.
